greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of remainders when n is divided by its nonzero digits.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 10..10000
example: a(14)= 2 as 1 divides 14 and 2 is the remainder obtained when 14 is divided by 4.
program: f y x = if d == 0 then f y x' else f (y + mod n d) x'
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Feb 07 2002
ext: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 11 2002
